column4: I'm a not exactly adept at using linux. I've tried to set up a desktop for my mom using 8.04. She's using the internet and is using the thunderbird email client fairly well. However soemthing that she needs to be able to work from home is from this site http://www.broward.k12.fl.us/cab/. Could anyone assist me with a problem Im having?
if you said what the problem is, I could decide whether I can help
I'm sure it doesn't stand for fibre channel protocol. Could it mean First Class protocol?
